awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Wordless (save for the song "Walking in the Air") animated adventure about a young English boy who makes a snowman one Christmas Eve, only for it to come to life that night and take him on a magical adventure to the North Pole to meet Santa Claus.

title: The Snowman
